Uses of Class
alluxio.exception.AlluxioException

  • Packages that use AlluxioException 
    Package Description
    alluxio  
    alluxio.exception  
    alluxio.replay  

    • Uses of AlluxioException in alluxio

      Methods in alluxio that throw AlluxioException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected <V> V AbstractClient.retryRPC(AbstractClient.RpcCallableThrowsAlluxioTException<V> rpc)
      Similar to AbstractClient.retryRPC(RpcCallable) except that the RPC call may throw AlluxioTException and once it is thrown, it will be transformed into AlluxioException and be thrown.
      protected <V> V AbstractThriftClient.retryRPC(AbstractThriftClient.RpcCallableThrowsAlluxioTException<V,C> rpc)
      Similar to AbstractThriftClient.retryRPC(RpcCallable) except that the RPC call may throw AlluxioTException and once it is thrown, it will be transformed into AlluxioException and be thrown.
